name: Yankin' It
description:
In this game, you yank out roots of old and forgotten vehicles from various places you used to visit from years past.

This game has very simple controls: you only need to use a mouse to left-click!

Each level features a different location, and a different vehicle.

For Global Game Jam 2023.

---
